revised_title: Investigation of Light Scattering and Absorption in Gaseous Media
tldr: The authors investigate the scattering and absorption of light in gaseous media, with applications to the intensity of sky radiation. They introduce a second term in the differential equation for loss of intensity in a beam of radiation, accounting for attenuation by absorption without scattering. They also consider the effect of self-illumination on the intensity of sky radiation and apply their findings to problems of solar radiation attenuation and sky radiation intensity.
